context_bundle.summary: Go command-line application development with Cobra for commands, Viper for configuration, and Bubbletea for TUI

onboarding.quick_start: go get -u github.com/spf13/cobra@latest && cobra-cli init && cobra-cli add serve
common_patterns: Cobra command: 'var rootCmd = &cobra.Command{Use: "app", Short: "Description", Run: func(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string) { fmt.Println("Hello") }}'
Subcommands: 'var serveCmd = &cobra.Command{Use: "serve", Run: func(cmd *cobra.Command, args []string) { startServer() }}; rootCmd.AddCommand(serveCmd)'
Viper config: 'viper.SetConfigName("config"); viper.AddConfigPath("."); viper.ReadInConfig(); port := viper.GetInt("port")'

Bubbletea TUI: 'type model struct { cursor int }; func (m model) Update(msg tea.Msg) (tea.Model, tea.Cmd) { switch msg := msg.(type) { case tea.KeyMsg: if msg.String() == "q" { return m, tea.Quit } } return m, nil }'
Progress bar: 'import "github.com/schollz/progressbar/v3"; bar := progressbar.Default(100); for i := 0; i < 100; i++ { bar.Add(1); time.Sleep(40 * time.Millisecond) }'
known_errors: command not found: Build with 'go build' and add to PATH or use 'go install'
config not loading: Check file path and name, use 'viper.Debug()' for troubleshooting
flag not recognized: Ensure flag defined before Parse(), check flag name spelling
TUI rendering issues: Check terminal compatibility, use 'tea.WithAltScreen()' for full screen
environment variable not read: Use viper.AutomaticEnv() and correct prefix
subcommand not working: Ensure AddCommand() called, check command Use field
